mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Bishop, Henry A.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Coal Run, Washington Co., O [Coal Run, Washington County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Bishop, Henry A. Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture right leg. Location Wounded: Berryville, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/03. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Deserted 1865/05/08. Committed a rape on a woman near Pompy Smash.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bishop, Henry A.
Gun shot fracture right leg

A
